ComicInfo.Penciller: Brett Weldele,Matthew Dow Smith,Zach Howard,Brett Weldele,Matthew Dow Smith,Zach Howard
ComicInfo.Summary: The death of Astrid Bonn's brother and father leads her to leave New York and return home to Switzerland to discover a super-natural legacy that will redefine the world that she lives in. Here, on a clockworks older than time itself, one that boasts to be the very gateway to Heaven, she will face enemies of earthly and other-worldy design.
